Header: Court Issue Notice On Attorney General
Content: The Colombo Fort Magistrate Lanka Jayarathna ordered today to issue notice on the Attorney General through Fiscal Court in connection with the disappearance of 11 Tamil and Muslim youths in Kotahena and Trincomalee. Earlier, when this Case was taken up before Court, the Magistrate had ordered the Court Registrar to inform the Attorney General by Registered post to intervene in this Case. When the Case was taken before Court today, there was no representation by the Attorney General.  Later the Magistrate ordered to issue notice on the Attorney General through the Fiscal Court. The Magistrate also stated that the investigation by the CID have been completed with regard to this incident. She said that it is the responsibility of the Attorney General’s Office to assist in Court functions. The missing person’s incident was reported during 2008 and 2009. The investigation conducted by the CID revealed that a group of Navy officers were involved. The Case hearing will be on August 30th.
